content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Original Stone Furnace at position (43, -82)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position (43.0, -82.0)) with fuel {'coal': 9} and source {'iron-ore': 8} producing {'iron-plate': 1}
  
### New Stone Furnace at position (45, -82)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position (45.0, -82.0)) with fuel {'coal': 18} and source {'iron-ore': 1} producing {'iron-plate': 3}

### Burner Mining Drill at position (40, -84)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position (40.0, -84.0)) with fuel {'coal': 3} and status EntityStatus.WORKING

### Wooden Chest at position (39, -85)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest (position (39.5, -85.5)) with inventory {'coal': 198}

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items not present in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into any furnace or machine. For example, you attempted to insert iron-ore and coal when they were not available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
